Made from BPA-free, food grade silicone, these utensils are safe to use with any type of food or beverage. The set includes 14 pieces, such as turner tongs, spatula, spoon, brush, whisk, and more, to fully meet all your cooking needs. 

These kitchen tools are designed with a stainless steel core and a 446°F heat-resistant wooden handle, ensuring durability and comfort while cooking, baking, or mixing. The wooden handle prevents heat transfer, so you can handle hot pots and pans without worrying about burning your hands.

Cleaning these utensils is a breeze, thanks to their easy-to-clean design. However, they are not recommended for dishwasher use.
